Elementary:
Imagine that you read a headline ‘Fit in four
minutes’ in a health magazine. Would you
believe it? Well, Dr Izumi Tabata’s training
programme – 20 seconds of intensive effort, ten
seconds of rest, repeat eight times – promises
that it is possible to be fit with just 88 minutes of
training a week.

of cardiovascular exercise on an exercise bike
five times a week. The other group did a
ten-minute warm-up on the bike, then four
minutes of Tabata training, four times a week –
plus one 30-minute session of exercise with two
minutes of Tabata.

This will give their bodies the chance to rest and
recover, especially if they have injuries.”
